english_translation: Narrated regarding al-Husayn: Regarding his age and death, various accounts are reported. One account says he was killed at age fifty-nine. Another account mentions he was killed on the day of Ashura. Another account from Abd al-Malik ibn Qais states that when he saw the Prophet ﷺ in a dream and mentioned it to Ibn Abbas, Ibn Abbas said: 'Did you see al-Husayn ibn Ali when you saw him?' The narrator said: 'Yes, by Allah, I saw him wearing shrouds when I saw him walking.' Ibn Abbas said: 'We used to compare him to the Prophet ﷺ.' And according to another account by Sufyan ibn Uyaynah from Ja'far ibn Muhammad from his father, al-Husayn ibn Ali was killed at the age of fifty-eight.
